key_risk_themes: ["Security of User-Generated Content Execution","Robustness of Offline Data Synchronization","Operational Resilience and Pipeline Stability"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize development of a comprehensive E2E test suite for offline synchronization to mitigate data loss risk.","Implement robust error handling and documented manual override procedures for the CI/CD pipeline to ensure deployment capability.","Conduct a formal peer review of the `isolated-vm` Lambda implementation and its least-privilege IAM role before deployment."]
